channel.title: General on Engineering journey
channel.description: Recent content in General on Engineering journey

item.title: Do You Hear Me Now?
item.description: This is officially my “Can you hear me now ?" moment. Took me quite a while to figure out the nooks and cranny of setting up a web page to record down my engineering journey page using Hugo. I am almost done with my University / College education. I am just waiting for graduation ceremony now having completed all my courses and tests. In the mean time, I am embarking on a journey of life long self-learning.
